Introduction

Lee Gyehun, known under his stage name Kyehoon, is a South Korean singer under JYP Entertainment. He is best known as the oldest member and leader of the boy group KickFlip.

In 2016, he participated in JYP Entertainment's 12th Open Audition where he finished 1st place, thus automatically becoming a trainee in the company.

In 2021, Kyehoon participated in the 2021 survival show Loud. He finished second place in the final episode, making him an official member of JYP Entertainment's upcoming boy group.
